item.title: CVS gets an upgrade to buy from Leerink Partners after pharmacy operator's strong earnings
item.description: CVS Health has more room to run even as the broader health care segment remains troubled, according to Leerink Partners.

item.title: 2025 could end up being the year of the spinoff as breakups such as Honeywell abound
item.description: Lennar's spinoff of Millrose Properties last week kicks off a spinoff calendar that many expect will ramp up this year.

item.title: BlackRock's Rick Rieder thinks this corner of the bond market is too cheap to ignore
item.description: Rick Rieder recently began buying longer-dated corporate bonds. Here some of the names he added to his iShares Flexible Income Active ETF.

item.title: Morgan Stanley's Jonas says keep buying Tesla as it's the best way to play the AI transformation of manufacturing
item.description: Tesla is the most diversified company developing intelligent machines that will transform manufacturing, according to Morgan Stanley.

item.title: Amazon primed for another comeback, according to the charts
item.description: Frank Cappelleri breaks down the charts on the retail and tech giant.
